channel.title: How to add npc tradable ( shops ) on a rsps ( erasedpkz source )
channel.description: inm using base erapespkz, source is btkscape plz someone could tell me how to add npc tradable and make shops with it. ohh and idk how to explain but when i go in shops (blocknote) ... hard to explain. but in this blocknote, when we make space ( cuz i want do like ) id 1042 200000000 1044 20000000 like... when i compile its said error cuz i did ( space ) by my self, what im suposed to do if i want to make it work? and plz someone know a video that they show how to add npc and make shops ? plz?
